value:
Watch my sisters and me next
battle—we're pretty amazing!

Thanks for being you,
$Nu!$k$pNobody works like you—on or off
the battlefield!

I make the best stew! Come on now.
Eat up! There's plenty more where
that came from!

People say I act childish, but I'm
basically grown-up already!

I feel like I could fly to the top
of the sky!

I was worried I was getting rusty,
but I guess not!

Thanks! I'll be even more
incredible now!

Hi there, I'm Est. I'm from the
Macedonian Whitewings! Or...
at least I was!

Abel and I run a small shop
together back home in Altea.$k$pThat was always my wish for us,
but I'm glad to be here, helping you
with this fight.$k$pAfter all, that's how I met you, and
you've shown me all the different
bonds people can share...$k$pI used to see things a bit
childishly, but seeing that means
I'm an adult now, right? Haha!$k$pIn any case, thank you for all
you've helped me to see. I'll keep
counting on you!
My sisters and I are the best at flying!
Oh, hey, would you like some stew?
You can expect good things from me!
I wonder if I'm too childish...
Let's get out there and do our best, OK?
